roleset.name: relinquish, give up rights to

example.name: active
example.text: In London , prices finished at intraday peaks , comforted by a reassuring early performance on Wall Street and news that the British government will waive its `` golden share '' in auto maker Jaguar .

propbank.arg: its `` golden share '' in auto maker Jaguar

example.name: passive
example.text: But although the golden share has been waived ...

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: The filing also said certain provisions which apply to persons acquiring 20 % or more of Intelogic common stock , were waived by Intelogic for Mr. Edelman , who is chairman of the company .

propbank.arg: certain provisions which apply to persons acquiring 20 % or more of Intelogic common stock
for Mr. Edelman , who is chairman of the company

example.name: arg1
example.text: - waiving of application fees due to them not following their own timescale -LRB- 2 weeks on website ! -RRB- and not following ' good practice '

propbank.arg: due to them not following their own timescale -LRB- 2 weeks on website ! -RRB- and not following ' good practice '

roleset.note: WAIVING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, waive-v.01. No VNcls. (from waiving.01-n)
